name: Traitor
description:
All damage that affected unit receives from foes becomes nonlethal. If this unit is reduced to 1 HP, it permanently changes armies to the army of the applying unit (this unit is under group control unless otherwise specified) and this condition ends.
The affected unit is not retained between battles, unless it becomes an named NPC, and only then may be deployed as any other NPC would, subject to the rules of the GM for a specific map.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
